Key Match Events: Kohli hits his third fifty of the competition
India's Arshdeep takes crucial wickets in the final over
Post-Match Reflections: India captain Rohit Sharma praised Kohli and Rahul for their performances
Bangladesh captain Shakib Al Hasan acknowledged their consistent struggle against India
Virat Kohli expressed happiness with his batting and the team's performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bangladesh's hopes dashed by a five-run loss
India secure top spot in Group 2 with a win
